overview: Pam Graham has a reunion with her two hot, sensual classmates, Arden Hall and Jean Perkins. When the three are reunited, Jean announces the return of another friend, the sexually mysterious Candice Fields.  The girls are flushed with excitement at the thought of Candice's return. She had inspired many of the erotic intimacies they shared in college.  After Candice arrives, her sensuality and energy quickly enrapture the hot, young girls. They abandon themselves to each other and their men in a torrid, frenzied climax.
tagline: Let's spend the night... Shacking Up with Amber Lynn
title: Shacking Up
